page.title: 02INDUSTRY - QUARRIES
page.content: INDUSTRY - Quarries - There are three quarries still in production - Longcliffe,Bennetts and Tilcon. The pattern of work has changed dramatically. Stone is no longer quarried by hand, powerful machinery has taken the place of manual workers. There are many products in addition to stone for building and road maintenance. Ground limestone is used in argriculture for fertilization, manufacture of animal feed, chemistry, glass,asphalt,sugar refining and rubber products. All transport is by road, hence many men are employed as lorry and tanker drivers. HOBEN no longer make fire bricks, silica & ganister products are made for the use of steel works. SPENCER BROS. a small family firm - produce a sand and graphite product which is used in the lining of furnace
